transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Very good afternoon, ma'am. Kekuthungala? Naa Santhosh IndiaMART-la irunthu call pannirukkaen, ma'am.
Customer: Sollunga.
Executive: Okay, ma'am, fine. Ippa neenga mail send pannirukkeenga illaiyaa?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Andha mailukku na ungalukku ippa na eppdinguradha solren. Neenga buyleads edukkireengala?
Customer: Naa meeting-la irukkaen. I'm between-la meeting-la irukkaen. Neenga ellaathaiyum enakku detailed-aa email-la pottaa, en team paathu send panniruvaanga.
Executive: Okay, ma'am. Okay, ma'am. Neenga team-ukku send pannunga. Naa enna as per, naa enna vandhu paatheenganaa, naa ungalukku data wise naa kettirundhennaa, neenga buylead construction-oda buyers number-dhaan neenga vandhu paatheenganaa kettirundhen. Okay-vaa? Adhu ungalala mattum-dhaan vandhu paatheenganaa edukka mudiyum.
Okay-vaa? Adhu-dhaan naa vandhu paatheenganaa guide panren. Naa ungalukku solli irundhen. Adhu-dhaan naa ungalukku clear-aave naa mail-layum ungalukku koduthen.
Customer: Illa, adhu clear-aa enakku potturunga. Naa company policy check pannikitteen-naa, adhu enga internal data adhu illaiyaa? Then, because IndiaMART-oda details, lead qualities unga side neenga check pannikkalaam. And adhu irukku. But adhu vandhu paatheenganaa buyers-oda details and naanga follow-up details ellaam engaloda company-oda privacy record. Because naa poi ennodaa company-oda privacy record check pannittu, apparam-dhaan naa adhu kodukka mudiyum. Neenga enna panreengannaa, andha email irukku illingalaa, neenga ippa enkkitta kettadhaa azhagaa draft panni, "Madam, you are asking the internal sales record of your company, kindly give it," appdingu podunga. Naa enga boss kitta consult pannittu, sir-um CC-la irukkaaru. If he permits, I'll share it with you.
Executive: Okay. Ippa Rithika madam-kkaan feedback-um koduthirukkeengale, ma'am, not started pottirukkeenga. Adhu enna reason-nu theriyala.
Customer: Illa, illa, illa. Neethu enna sir nadandhuchu? Naa sir kitta kettuttu-dhaan koduthen. Neenga venaa sir-ukku call panni pesikkonga. Ungalukku positive feedback maaththunumnnaa. Sir vandhu he was really upset.
Executive: Okay, okay.
Customer: Because avar first call vandhu irukkaaru.
Executive: Queries naa vandhu paatheenganaa resolve panradhukkaanadhaan.
Customer: Adhu varaikum adhu paalla. I'll give positive feedback pottu-dhaan koduppen. But sir sollittaaru, "Neenga negative podunga. Adha thaandi edhaanaa neenga Delhi office-la pesureenga," appdingaraaru. Avar startup-la central government work pannittu irukkaaru sir. Avarkitta appdi pesinaa avar enna pannuvaaru?
Executive: Ma'am, naanumee naa avarkitta appdi pesala, ma'am. Neenga-dhaan vandhu paatheenganaa.
Customer: IndiaMART-la issue vandhuchu illingalaa, andha time-la Delhi-la irukkara IndiaMART unga head office-la poi resolve panni kodutthaanga. Adhukku apparam-dhaan unga team-la irundhu emergency-aa vandhu ellaamee resolve aachu. Naanga first time on board pannappo. Sir ennaichu, adhanaala ennaala edhum help panna mudiyala. Neenga sir-raa-dhaan contact pannunga.
Executive: Sari, ma'am. Naa ippa andha concern-ai-mee naa vandhu paatheenganaa naa close panren. Okay-vaa? Naa ungalukku neenga ketta andha data-s-mee naa vandhu paatheenganaa ungalukku naa share pannala.
Okay-vaa? Enna contact neenga sales neenga edhula irukku CRM enga irukkinguradhu. Neenga enna kettirundheenga, ma'am? Ungaloda company-oda privacy records engalukku share pannunga appdinnu mention pannunnu solli irundheengalaa?
Customer: Privacy records illa neenga sales record-aa enakku share pannu. Unga company-oda sales record vandhu private illa. Enga company-oda private records-dhaan adhu. Adhu-dhaan neenga kekkureenga, right-aa? So, adhu enakku mail podunga. Naa sir kitta unga company-oda sales record ungalukku share panna mudiyumaa naa kettuttu send panren appdinnu sonnen. Yennaa IndiaMART-la ippa ennodaa account vandhu neenga paakkalaam. Ungalaala evvalavu details paakka mudiyudho, adha vachchi-dhaan neenga analyse panni enakku report kodukkanum. Adha vittuttu enkkitta vandhuttu ennodaa buyer leads kodunga, idhu kodunga appdinnu kekkuradhu it is not like enga policy allow pannaathu. Ungaloda policy allow pannaathu. Request-dhaan irukku. Just a request.
Executive: Sari, ma'am. Adhu-dhaan ma'am. Naanumee ungalukku oru suggestion neenga valuable-aa leads illa, enquiries illa neenga oru suggestion-aa sonneenga illaiyaa? Adhu-dhaan naanumee inga neenga eduththirukkeenga. Enna side enna default? Buyer number fault-aa? Illa ennainguradhu namma check panni paakkalaam appdinguradhukkaaga-dhaan naammalumee vandhu paatheenganaa kekkurom.
Customer: Sir, namma sonnom illing sir, order value kammiyaa irukku. 100 litre vaangura.
Executive: Order value kammiyaa irukku. 100 litre vaanguravanga adhu-dhaan puriyudhu ma'am. Adhu-dhaan ma'am solren. Valuable-aana leads illa. Order value kammiyaa irukku. Buyer response illa. Requirements illa. Indha maari-laam sonneenga-la. Namma koduththirukka value-kkum order-kkum vandhu paatheenganaa kekka maattraanga appdinnu-laam concern neenga solli irundheenga illaiyaa?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Adhu-dhaan ma'am naanumee vandhu paatheenganaa resolve panradhukkaaga-dhaan number kekkuren. Naa ungalukku sales record naa ungalukku vandhu paatheenganaa naanumee andha mail-la neenga sonna maariyaana sentence-ai vachchi naanumee vandhu paatheenganaa naa share panren. Sariingalaa?
Customer: Okay, sir. Okay.
Executive: Buyer-oda number ungaloda privacy policies edhuvaa irundhaalume andha oru details-ai vachchi naa vandhu paatheenganaa ungalukku naa share panren. Vera edhaavadhu ungalukku adhu-la idhu pannannumaa, ma'am?
Customer: Sir, oru issue. Second issue naa sonna maari customer care support suththamaa sariyilla, accounts manager. Adhu rendu. Rendumee major-dhaan. It's not like leads neenga solve pannitteengannaa, rendu query unaddressed-aa poittirukku, threatening-aa irukku.
Executive: Okay, ma'am. Puriyudhu, ma'am. Puriyudhu, puriyudhu.
Okay, okay, fine, sir. But vera edhaavadhu add pannannumaa? Enna extraordinary-aa vera edhaavadhu add pannannumaa? Neenga edhaavadhu sonneengannaa konjam naanum illingannaa ungalukku.
Customer: Illa, illa. Idhu rendu query solve panna.
Executive: Yaarumee irukkaadhu, adhanaala-dhaan.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Neenga sonna enna solution-o adha naa vandhu paatheenganaa update panren. Sariingalaa? Indha concern-ai-mee naa vandhu paatheenganaa ippa naa close panren. Ippa mail revert poittirukku illaiyaa? Idhai namma vandhu paatheenganaa follow pannikkalaam. Sariingalaa? Indha concern-ai-mee naa vandhu paatheenganaa naa close panren. Sariingalaa, ma'am?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay. Okay, ma'am.
Customer: Okay. Thank you, sir.
Executive: Thank you. Vera edhaavadhu ippa indha call feedback-kkaan call okay-vaa?
Customer: Okay, sir. Naa idhukku positive-dhaan koduppen.
Executive: Indha call feedback-kkaan call okay-vaa, ma'am?
Customer: Ya, ya, ya. Okay.
Executive: Naa kettuttu-dhaan ungalukku call-ai naa vandhu paatheenganaa naa disconnect panren, sir manager-aa. Indha ungalukku feedback call okay-vaa?
Customer: Idhu okay-dhaan.
Executive: Okay. Previous-aa call-ai-mee naa vandhu paatheenganaa naa close panren. Sariingalaa?
Customer: Okay. Okay.
Executive: Okay. Fine, ma'am. Fine. Thank you. Thank you, ma'am.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants internal sales record of the company.

- Customer care support is not good.

- Accounts manager support is not good.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to share sales record.

- Executive assured to update the solution.

- Executive closed the concern.



Next Steps: 

- Follow up on the mail revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- sales record, customer care, accounts manager, feedback
